meanings.definition: A large female gamete in certain algae and protozoa.
meanings.sent1: The macrogametes are the big female cells in some tiny plants and animals.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study how macrogametes help algae and protozoa reproduce.
meanings.sent3: The macrogametes threw a party to celebrate their important role in the ecosystem.
meanings.sent4: The macrogametes are like queens in the world of tiny organisms, waiting to create new life.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the macrogametes shimmered like precious jewels, full of potential.

meanings.definition: The female reproductive cell in certain unicellular organisms.
meanings.sent1: Tiny unicellular organisms rely on macrogametes to create new life.
meanings.sent2: In biology class, we learned about the function of macrogametes in single-celled creatures.
meanings.sent3: The macrogametes in the pond had a gossip session about their next division.
meanings.sent4: Each macrogamete is a tiny powerhouse, ready to spark the cycle of life.
meanings.sent5: The survival of the unicellular organism depended on the macrogametes' ability to reproduce.
